history: Updated version of NDC to combined NDC build to pick up old codes
Updated version of NDC to combined NDC build to pick up old codes
Add fhir.dicom to the package list
Update SNOMED CT Canadian Edition to 20210930 version.
Update SNOMED CT US Edition to 20220301 version.
Update SNOMED CT International Edition to 20220331 version.  Update LOINC to 2.72 version.
Add SNOMED CT International Edition 20220131 version.
Update SNOMED CT Canadian Edition to 20220331 version.
Re-configured support for SNOMED CT Intl. Edition 20210731 (for IPS).
Update SNOMED CT Belgian extension to 20220315 version (based on 20220131 Intl. Edition).
Update SNOMED CT AU Edition to version 20220731.
Update SNOMED CT International Edition to version 20220731.
Update SNOMED CT US Edition to version 20220901.
Update SNOMED CT CA Edition to version 20220930.
Update SNOMED CT NL Edition to version 20220930 and BE Edition to version 20221115.
Update SNOMED CT International Edition to version 20230131 and US Edition to version 20230301.
Update LOINC to version 2.74 (a). (Fix multi-heirarchy import)
Add SNOMED CT Swiss extension (20221207 version) (based on 20221031 Intl. Edition).
Update SNOMED CT Swiss extension to 20230607 version (based on the 20230430 Intl. Edition).
Add SNOMED CT UK Monolith Edition 20230412 version.  Re-ordered country-specific content entries alphabetically.

Update SNOMED CT International Edition to version 20230731.  Remove support for 20190731, 20200731 and 20210731 versions.  Continue to support 20230131 version.  Update NL Edition to version 20230331.
Update SNOMED CT AU Edition to version 20230731 and US Edition to version 20230901.
Update SNOMED CT International Edition to version 20230901 and continue to support the 20230731 and 20230131 versions.
Add support for SNOMED CT IPS Terminology version 20221130.
Update SNOMED CT Belgian Edition to version 20231115.
Add R5 and Tx-Registry End-points (mode=test for the latter).
Make /snomed end-point test-only while performance issues are resolved.
Update SNOMED CT Swedish Extension to version 20231130 and add version 20220531.
Update SNOMED CT International Extension to version 20240201 and LOINC to version 2.77.
Update SNOMED CT US Edition to 20240301 version.
Update SNOMED CT Danish Extension to version 20240331.
